rankings.algorithm.description: Our ranking algorithm combines quantitative metrics with qualitative assessments to provide a comprehensive view of AI coding tools. We update rankings weekly based on new data and continuously refine our methodology.

newsletter.verification.title: Email Verification
newsletter.verification.success.title: Email Verified!
newsletter.verification.success.message: Your email has been successfully verified. You'll start receiving our weekly newsletter with the latest AI tool rankings and insights.
This email address has already been verified. You're all set to receive our newsletters!
newsletter.verification.errors.missingTo: The verification link appears to be incomplete. Please check your email for the correct link.
newsletter.verification.errors.invalidTo: This verification link is invalid or has expired. Please subscribe again to receive a new verification email.
newsletter.verification.errors.failed.me: We couldn't verify your email at this time. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
newsletter.verification.errors.unexpecte: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
newsletter.unsubscribe.title: Unsubscribe from Newsletter
newsletter.unsubscribe.errors.failed.mes: We couldn't process your unsubscribe request. Please try again later.

home.categories.autonomousAgents.name: Autonomous Agents
home.methodology.algorithmDescription: Our advanced ranking algorithm considers 8 key factors with sophisticated modifiers:
home.methodology.keyModifiersDescription: Three sophisticated modifiers ensure fair and accurate rankings:
home.methodology.factors.innovation.name: Innovation
home.methodology.factors.agentic.name: Agentic Capability
home.methodology.factors.agentic.descrip: Autonomous coding abilities and multi-step task completion
home.methodology.factors.performance.des: Code quality, speed, and benchmark results
home.methodology.factors.traction.name: Market Traction
home.methodology.factors.traction.descri: User adoption, growth rate, and market presence
home.methodology.modifiers.innovationDec: Innovation Decay - Recent innovations score higher
home.methodology.modifiers.platformRisk: Platform Risk - Independence bonuses, lock-in penalties
home.methodology.modifiers.revenueQualit: Revenue Quality - Enterprise revenue weighted higher

home.methodology.modifiers.risk.name: Platform Risk
home.methodology.modifiers.revenue.name: Revenue Quality
home.methodology.modifiers.revenue.descr: Enterprise revenue weighted higher than consumer
